content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628066972251{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628063345129{padding-right: 30px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Fullstack Software Development” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1635250584888{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Full-time (6 Months)” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:left|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1628067490048{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]In 24 intensive weeks, acquire the skills and knowledge of a Full Stack Developer, Learn and build your own complete web development portfolio from scratch to finish and change your career.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Apply Now” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”primary” size=”lg” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fresidence-program-registration%2F|||” css=”.vc_custom_1628363028534{padding-top: 24px !important;padding-bottom: 16px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3450″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1628067032160{border-radius: 15px !important;}” el_class=”round-img”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1635330209344{padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: rgba(228,240,238,0.54) !important;*background-color: rgb(228,240,238) !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Details” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%2317355c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Date: 17th, January 2022

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_column_text]

Venue: 42 Montgomery Road, First Floor, Yaba, Lagos

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_column_text]

Duration: 6 Months

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_column_text]

Time: 10am – 4pm (Mondays – Thursdays)

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_column_text]Price: ₦1,000,000[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1628066855071{padding-right: 70px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”About this course” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%2317355c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Our Full Stack Software development course is an immersive experience that takes you from beginner to junior software developer in 24 weeks. At the end of the course, you will know how to build world-class and Human-centered softwares, understand web-application workflow and work across cross-functional teams of developers, designers and product managers.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”What You’ll Learn” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2317355c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1628066190839{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Our full stack software development course follows a step by step approach to helping you learn irrespective of your prior knowledge of tech, until you can build your own web applications from scratch.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

Intro to Web Development – PART 1

Our Fullstack Course is very intense. And starting this way will help you prepare for the next 6 Months for which you will be in this program. This section of the program will require you put in a minimum of 24hrs of classwork room time a week and 10hours of personal practice and a total of 48 hours for the next 2 Weeks to cover the curriculum

At the end of this 2 Weeks you will learn;

  • Web 101, how the web works
  • Terminal basic commands
  • Git basic commands
  • HTML / CSS foundations
  • JavaScript foundations
  • Tech workflows and tools in a startup

 

UI/UX Design – PART 2

In this program, students will learn design thinking, ideation, wireframing, prototyping and how to build their first minimum viable product. Here students will master how to create a world-class User interface and user experience for every product they will be building in the future.

 

Web Development – PART 3

Bootstrap:
2 Bootstrap projects

ES6
Learn ES6, your second programming language after ruby, to add dynamic behaviors to your website or update pages without reloading thanks to AJAX. Understand JavaScript fundamental concepts and learn to use all the necessary JS web tools like Babel, Webpack or yarn.

AJAX
API consumption with dummy data(copying a popular website) – 1 Week

 

Backend Web Development (Python) – PART 4

  • Python
  • Django
  • MySQL
  • Python Project

 

Agile Software Development – PART 5

Learn fundamental agile concepts to enhance your software development skills. In this course, you will explore benefits of agile software development for your development team, your end users, and your organization as a whole.

At the end of the class students would have build a fullstack application and be able to build any type of application they want to.

 

Capstone Project: Turn an idea into a product

Students will build 10 different projects in these 6 Months and create a portfolio that can be used to get their first job.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Requirements” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2317355c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • A computer on which you can install software (Windows, MacOS, or Linux)
  • 6 Months to learn and work hard to build a career in tech.
  • No prior programming experience is required. We will start from the very basics

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Who this course is for” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2317355c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • You should take this course if you are looking to build complete applications, and make a big time career transition.
  • This course is for you if you want to pursue a career in Fullstack Development.
  • The course is also ideal for beginners, as it starts from the fundamentals and gradually builds up your skills.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fresidence-program-registration%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1628066665958{background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Details” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1628068358850{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #17355c !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Date: 17th, January 2022

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

Duration: 6 Months

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]

Time: 10am – 4pm (Mondays – Thursdays)

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_column_text]Price: ₦1,000,000[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fresidence-program-registration%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|” el_class=”fwidth”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628068531750{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: rgba(228,240,238,0.3) !important;*background-color: rgb(228,240,238) !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Choose Univelcity?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%2317355c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Univelcity is a tech school designed to accelerate the growth of tech talent in Africa for the growing demand by businesses, startups in Nigeria and around the world. Our approach is an Agile Project-based learning that focuses on in-demand tech skills by the industries.

After the training, we connect our graduates to jobs with local and international companies. Ranging from internships to Full time roles.

In the last 3 Years we have trained over 500 developers with more than 400 of them tracked gainfully employed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wyxFlbG07sY” css=”.vc_custom_1628065541399{border-radius: 35px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
